name: Battle Boxer King
description: BBK token is the only commercial value transmission mediumcirculating in the ecology. It is used in mining, metauniverse, swap, Web3.0, Domino public chain and other scenarios. It also exists asanecological governance token, with which the holder can exercisetherightto participate in voting decisions, so as to manage the wholeecology. With data transmission as the main body and other applicationscenariosas the starting point, token will play a role in the global informationsharing and synchronization system, information settlement system
